divs: Sighting DetailsMy dog was barking and very active. he is not normally this way unless he is bothered by something. I followed him to the front door and looked up. there was a very bright light but not a star or a airplane. it dropped down from where it was and as it dropped it got dimmer then it went away and as it did it got dimmer very fast I mean it happened in about 3 or 4 seconds. from bright to gone.
Summary: Bright light brighter than any other in the sky
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There was one other sighting in Sacramento on or around August 7th 2008
